data.question: What is the empirical formula of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole?
What method was used for the high-resolution atmospheric-pressure-chemical-ionization time-of-flight mass-spectrometry (HR-APCI-TOF-MS) recording?
What is the role of MnO2 in the synthesis of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4)?
data.answer: MnO2 is used to oxidize 5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)corrole to form 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4).

data.question: What is the yield percentage of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4) synthesis?
What is the purpose of recrystallization from dichloromethane/n-hexane in the synthesis of nickel complex 4Ni?
data.answer: Recrystallization from dichloromethane/n-hexane is used to purify the nickel complex 4Ni.

data.question: What is the chemical shift of the NH signal in the 1H NMR spectrum of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4)?
What is the role of Zn(OAc)2 in the synthesis of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole zinc(II) complex (4Zn)?
data.answer: Zn(OAc)2 is used for the metalation of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole to form the zinc(II) complex.

data.question: What is the yield percentage of the pyridinated zinc complex 4ZnPy synthesis?
Is the compound 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4) aromatic or antiaromatic?
What is the role of B(C6F5)3 in the synthesis of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrolato nickel(II) tris(pentafluorophenyl)borane complex (4Ni·B(C6F5)3)?
data.answer: B(C6F5)3 acts as a Lewis acid to enhance the antiaromatic character of the nickel(II) complex.

data.question: What is the crystal system of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4)?
What is the space group of the 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole palladium(II) complex (4Pd)?
What is the role of femtosecond transient absorption spectroscopy in the study of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole complexes?
data.answer: Femtosecond transient absorption spectroscopy is used to measure the excited-state dynamics of the complexes.

data.question: What is the role of DFT calculations in the study of 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole complexes?
data.answer: DFT calculations are used to analyze the electronic structures and predict properties such as aromaticity and excited-state dynamics.

data.question: True or False: The compound 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4) exhibits Baird aromaticity in the triplet excited state.
True or False: The compound 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4) is more stable in its antiaromatic form.
True or False: The compound 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4) does not undergo metalation.
True or False: The compound 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4) exhibits a red-shift in the C=O stretching frequency upon transitioning to the T1 state.
True or False: The compound 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4) exhibits a blue-shift in the C=O stretching frequency upon transitioning to the T1 state.
True or False: The compound 10-Oxo-5,15-bis(pentafluorophenyl)isocorrole (4) does not exhibit any excited-state dynamics.
